RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 12200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRON WILMA stalked the early pace, moved up near the rail around the far turn through the stretch and finished well to be clear late under strong pressure. SOULSTONE was rushed from the inside to set the early pace, raced just off the inside in the lane and was no match for the winner late to finish second best. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS settled off the early going, moved up four wide through the stretch and kept on willing to the wire. FRANCIA (PER) stalked the pace, made a strong two wide bid near the five sixteenths pole, angled out to raced well off the inside in the drive and raced evenly late. DANCING FOR MONEY was off slowly, raced wide into the upper stretch, shifted in through the stretch and never was a serious threat. I MATTER was off a step slow, void of early speed, raced near the inside and never menaced. ADRIANA ES BONITA was coaxed along early and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: I Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, void speed, inside, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing for Money
ENTRY.OWNER: Velez Jose Luis and Szczepanski Emily
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, wide upper stretch, shifted in

ENTRY.NAME: Francia (PER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2wd bid 5/16, angled out upper stretch, even

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rail bid, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lemonsanddiamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4-wide bid, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 87. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT ESCAPE showed good early foot from the inside to set the pace and raced well clear in the stretch while being kept to pressure. ALL ABOUT CROGE chased the early pace while being ridden along, raced three to four wide through the far turn and was no match for the winner in the drive. AURA OF GOLD pressed the early leader while racing just off the inside and weakened a bit late. FLY HOME stalked the pace, raced four to five wide and had not enough in the drive. RURAL stalked the pace, raced three wide and was even late with no closing run. KNIGHTLY MISCHIEF settled off the early going, angled wide into the lane and had no late rally. ONE MORE RING stalked the pace along the inside and tired. NIKKI'STHEFAVORITE dropped back early, raced five wide around the far turn and never menaced. GREENSFELDER was off a step slow, raced three to four wide through the far turn and never threatened. GOLDEN CHELLA was off step slow, raced near the inside and never was a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Escape
ENTRY.OWNER: Hooves and Saddles LLC and Silver Lining Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, well clear, kept to pressure

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Chella
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, inside, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Greensfelder
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 3-4 wide turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Knightly Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, angled wide upper stretch, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATTUCK showed good early foot to set the early pace, raced off the inside in the stretch run and held gamely to be clear under strong handling. NYOMAN forwardly placed to lay up close, raced near the inside at the quarter pole, angled out to race from the outside in the lane, surged late and finished gamely to the wire. ARAZI LIKE MOVE dropped back early on, raced four to three wide and gained ground well late to improve position. ARTIE MY BOY stalked the pace, made a three wide bid near the quarter pole and flattened out. KREWE CHIEF was void of early speed, raced five to six wide around the far turn and never threatened while racing from the outside. CALL PAPA was slow early on, raced three to four wide and had no late rally. SILVER G T O dropped back early and failed to respond. TOO LEGIT failed to sustain a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Krewe Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 5-6 wide turn, no bid, outside

ENTRY.NAME: Nyoman
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, inside 1/4, angled, surged late, outside

ENTRY.NAME: Silver G T O
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Too Legit
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Attuck
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and TEC Racing (Elliott S Logan)
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, off rail, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: William L. Jones & Kathy L. Jones

ENTRY.NAME: Arazi Like Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4-3 wide bid, gaining late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).

CLAIM.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARD N'SWEET pressed the early lead from the outside near the half mile pole, took command and remained clear late under a steady hand ride. GILES broke to the outside, raced five wide around the first turn, raced from the outside in the stretch run and got up for the place position. PERFETTO showed good early speed from the inside to set the pace and weakened. IMTHEPRINCE dropped back early, raced near the inside around the far turn through the stretch and had no response. ALGORIX stalked the pace while racing three wide early and weakened. ROSAS WAY dropped back early, raced from the inside around the far turn and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside foe, drew off, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside far turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outside, 5wd 1st turn, outside lane, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEMPLE TITAN showed good early speed to set the pace, raced in hand down the backstretch, raced well clear in the stretch and was much the best while racing in hand. BOURBON TEDDY stalked the pace, raced two to three wide and was no match for the winner. TWICE AS SMART settled off the early going, made an advance through the far turn, raced near the inside in the drive and had not enough for the top pair. CHROMED IMPULSE race mid pack early, was near the rail past the quarter pole and had no final winning bid. PERFECT PICTURE dropped back early, swung seven deep into the upper stretch and had not enough. KAPHAVATA pressed early and gave way. RHYTHMIC RULER mid pack early stages, raced two to three wide and had no response. JUSTINSPEIGHTOFIT was unhurried early on and showed little. WHO CAN WIN void of early speed and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Temple Titan
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, in hand, long lead, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Chromed Impulse
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, inside 1/4, no final bid

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, swung 7wd upper stretch, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Twice as Smart
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside bid, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOWZANO dueled for the early lead from the inside, re-bid through the stretch and prevailed in a determined run. COWGIRL KIMMIE dueled for the early lead from the outside of foes, had a clear lead near the quarter pole, and just missed in a game effort. LILAC LACE raced off the early going, was three wide around the far turn, raced from the outside in the lane and finished willingly to the wire. ALL AMERICAN JEWEL was slow early and never was involved. LA MUNECA dueled between early, was pulled up and had to be vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: La Muneca
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled between, pulled up, vanned off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 22. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GARRETT rated along early, asked near the three eighths marker dueled into the far turn and kicked clear in the drive to be well clear under steady pressure. MIDNIGHT MIKEY showed good early speed to race clear early on, met bid near the three eighths pole, dug in kept on for the place position. YOU'RE MY BOY BLUE chased the early pace from the outside of foes, fanned seven wide into the upper stretch and flattened out. GOLDEN MONEY raced off the early going, raced from the outside in the lane and had not enough. HENRY THE CAT stalked the pace and tired while racing four to five wide. AUJARA was slow early and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Mikey
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, met bid 3/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: You're My Boy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3wd, fanned 7wd upper stretch, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 22 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHUTUPANDSHAKEIT showed good early speed to set the early pace and held gamely to be well clear under strong handling. LOVE'S TAVITO settled off the early going, moved up from the far outside in the stretch and got up for the place position. PISTOLPACKINPOLLY stalked the pace from the outside, raced seven wide into the upper stretch and kept on to the wire. HATTIE M dropped back early, raced from the inside through the stretch run and moved up to improve position. LADY GIULIANA raced three wide nearing the quarter pole, angled out to race wide and never threatened. CURIOSITY KILLS stalked the pace, raced four to five wide through the far turn and weakened. UNDERCOVER LADY chased the pace while racing three wide and faded. DATTTSAFANCYFOX pressed the pace from the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Shutupandshakeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, set pace, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Love's Tavito
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, outside bid, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Giuliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, 3wd 1/4, angled out, no bid
